channel.title: Ravers Fantasy || more pictures || more fixes
channel.description:
Well...
list of things i've achieved... ;D Im not the worlds best coder ._. just thought i'd ask you how im doin :3 [ol][li]almost full castle wars[/li] [li]90% Dwarf multicannon[/li] [li]95% mithril seeds. not clipped and doesn't correspond with the color on the ground ;p[/li] [li]All items that transform you into npcs work.[/li] [li]Retribution && working on wrath.[/li] [li]Earthquakes with 5 different scales.[/li] [li] Clipped following.[/li] [li]Loyalty titles, With the color on right click menu.[/li] [li]summoning interaction[/li] [li]2 quests, 5 achievements[/li] [li]Party room(still working on this)[/li] [li]Barrage orbs(not much lawl)[/li] [li]War minigame(pretty much like clan wars) Just.. With npc's on the teams.(still working)[/li] [li]Dominion tower[/li] [li]clan wars(..also not done)[/li] [li]Corresponding combat hit sprites.. I hope that makes sense xD[/li] [li]summoning special attack(not the familiar scrolls, i'm yet to start that)[/li] [li]Tornado's[/li] [li]100% private messaging[/li] [li]almost all items go to right slots[/li] [li]Weekly penguin system[/li] [li]100% overloads and super pots spec restore ect.[/li] [li] Sitting animation fixed (Doesn't show weapons)[/li] [li] Removed operate option[/li] [li] revenants (However you spell it)[/li] [li] Correct corresponding pick animations with mining[/li] [li] Just added pets![/li][/ol]
ya so, as you can see. I don't get much done ;D
pictures: [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vnbPAerIAXU&list=HL1337458437&feature=mh_lolz[/youtube] [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zGFLSFZkJgM&feature=youtu.be[/youtube] [img]http://i1152.photobucket.com/albums/p500/ravekitty12/rev.png[/img] [img]http://i1152.photobucket.com/albums/p500/ravekitty12/dominion.png[/img] [img]http://i1152.photobucket.com/albums/p500/ravekitty12/penguinmini.png[/img] [img]http://i1152.photobucket.com/albums/p500/ravekitty12/removed.png[/img] [img]http://i1152.photobucket.com/albums/p500/ravekitty12/pets.gif[/img] [img]http://i1152.photobucket.com/albums/p500/ravekitty12/look.gif[/img] [img]http://i1152.photobucket.com/albums/p500/ravekitty12/war.png[/img] [img]http://i1152.photobucket.com/albums/p500/ravekitty12/cwars.png[/img] [img]http://i1152.photobucket.com/albums/p500/ravekitty12/th_wrath.png[/img] [img]http://i1152.photobucket.com/albums/p500/ravekitty12/th_wrath-1.png[/img] [img]http://i1152.photobucket.com/albums/p500/ravekitty12/th_cannon.png[/img] [img]http://i1152.photobucket.com/albums/p500/ravekitty12/transform.png[/img] [img]http://i1152.photobucket.com/albums/p500/ravekitty12/floewrs.gif[/img]
Too lazy to add anymore pictures. Tell me how im doing ;D I had fun taking the pictures loolol

item.title: Ravers Fantasy || more pictures || more fixes
item.dc:creator: @ravekitty ravekitty
item.description:
@ravekitty wrote:

[quote=“tyb97, post:10, topic:442673”]Meh. I don’t see too much coming out of this. I do have a few questions though.

[ol][li]What do you actually plan to do to this that is significant?[/li]
[li]What is a “raver”?[/li]
[li]What have you done so far besides leeched some things off a tutorial, and edited a few lines?[/li]
[li]Why are you loading such a high cache? Its bound to cause problems.[/li][/ol]

Actually do something significant, and you get my support.[/quote]
Eventually I actually plan to rewrite the skills/And possibly the combat system… But I don’t plan very well.

A person who goes to raves/parties/clubs. lol >>
I’ve created 3 minigames(1 is complete…), Fixed a few small bugs such as: On death, it used to cause an exception & you wouldn’t lose items…>>
Converted some processes into event’s.
Nothing huge really >_<

And yea I do leech alot of tutorials…But I usually end up changing it because I don’t like the feel of a leecher ;D. ,_,

Don’t know much about loading caches… so. I don’t know why :}

Read full topic
item.source: Ravers Fantasy || more pictures || more fixes

item.title: Ravers Fantasy || more pictures || more fixes
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

Meh. I don’t see too much coming out of this. I do have a few questions though.

[ol][li]What do you actually plan to do to this that is significant?[/li]
[li]What is a “raver”?[/li]
[li]What have you done so far besides leeched some things off a tutorial, and edited a few lines?[/li]
[li]Why are you loading such a high cache? Its bound to cause problems.[/li][/ol]

Actually do something significant, and you get my support.

Read full topic

item.description:
@ravekitty wrote:

i don’t like that forum thing where the world map use to be it looks bad

lolol I know, I just haven’t got to fixing it yet >_<
Because I used paint to make it LOL

thats why i Fucking suggested to gimmie the Sprite and put “Forum” Over the World Map so is Neat
[/quote]
or just make a command? and not mess with the gameframe[/quote]
Actually the client that I got hahd the button already there. but it was square…
And I didn’t think to put the map there…
.-.

item.title: Ravers Fantasy || more pictures || more fixes
item.dc:creator: @ravekitty ravekitty
item.description:
@ravekitty wrote:

Well…

list of things i’ve achieved… ;D
Im not the worlds best coder ._.
just thought i’d ask you how im doin :3
[ol][li]almost full castle wars[/li]
[li]90% Dwarf multicannon[/li]
[li]95% mithril seeds. not clipped and doesn’t correspond with the color on the ground ;p[/li]
[li]All items that transform you into npcs work.[/li]
[li]Retribution && working on wrath.[/li]
[li]Earthquakes with 5 different scales.[/li]
[li] Clipped following.[/li]
[li]Loyalty titles, With the color on right click menu.[/li]
[li]summoning interaction[/li]
[li]2 quests, 5 achievements[/li]
[li]Party room(still working on this)[/li]
[li]Barrage orbs(not much lawl)[/li]
[li]War minigame(pretty much like clan wars) Just… With npc’s on the teams.(still working)[/li]
[li]Dominion tower[/li]
[li]clan wars(…also not done)[/li]
[li]Corresponding combat hit sprites… I hope that makes sense xD[/li]
[li]summoning special attack(not the familiar scrolls, i’m yet to start that)[/li]
[li]Tornado’s[/li]
[li]100% private messaging[/li]
[li]almost all items go to right slots[/li]
[li]Weekly penguin system[/li]
[li]100% overloads and super pots spec restore ect.[/li]
[li] Sitting animation fixed (Doesn’t show weapons)[/li]
[li] Removed operate option[/li]
[li] revenants (However you spell it)[/li]
[li] Correct corresponding pick animations with mining[/li]
[li] Just added pets![/li][/ol]

ya so, as you can see. I don’t get much done ;D
